title: Arms trade: US spending
text:
The full database is a little heavy for our purposes, so we’re going to download custom account data for the Department of Defence each year in turn.





These are current as of July 18, 2022, but you can download newer versions of the custom account data using the following options:
Budget Function National Defense
Budget Sub-Function
All
Agency
All
Federal Account
Federal account not selected
Account Level
Treasury Account
Disaster Emergency Fund Codes
—
File Submission Type
Account Breakdown by Program Activity & Object Class (File B), Account Breakdown by Award* (File C)
Fiscal Year
—
